subtitles:
56693 60113 ( Girl ) People once believed
that when someone dies...

60196 64492 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

67995 73251 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

76460 81466 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

135724 140228 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

140311 143564 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

147150 151112 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

153530 156742 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?

158244 161079 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

161163 166043 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

169003 172340 ( Man ) You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

172424 177219 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

177303 179597 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

179639 182516 - We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

182599 185184 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

185267 188730 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

188813 191815 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.

200031 204244 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

204327 206538 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

206622 210541 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

223469 227515 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

227556 230851 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
237274 239526 You lied to her about Eric.

241277 244990 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

256457 262171 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.

284609 288654 ( Sarah ) A building gets torch ed.
All that is left is ashes.

288738 291615 I used to think that was true
about everything...

296160 300123 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

300164 304543 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

342786 345998 What are you,
like the night watchman?

367308 370686 You know, what this place
needs is a...

373188 377610 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

377651 380654 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
380737 383031 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
383115 386159 Hey, hey, let me do it.

386242 390288 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

390330 392791 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

392832 394792 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.

404592 408429 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

408513 412432 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

414393 418062 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?

418146 421358 - They make you fart big time.
- ( Chuckling )

427697 430408 ( Man ) You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

430491 433118 from all the crap
floating around in it.

434285 438039 I wish I could have seen that.
( Whistling )

541966 545887 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

568867 572245 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

579501 582086 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

590135 592805 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.

592888 596183 - Mickey, call it in for me!
- ( Woman Shouting )

712456 717043 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.

727051 730137 - ( Shelly ) No! Eric!
- ( Man ) See ya!

780726 783644 - Hey, that's good.
- ( Man ) That's good.

787523 791110 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

794445 798908 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

802578 804580 You go over there
and talk to your pals--

807791 811503 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?

836317 840613 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

840696 844575 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

844659 847744 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
847828 850622 Fire it up! Fire it up!

853875 855835 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doing?

891243 894746 - I love you.
- Say that again.

908507 911677 - ( Sarah ) Wow, you look great.
- ( Shelly ) Ta-da!

918725 921311 - Come here! ( Laughing )
- No, no, no!
968104 971648 * It doesn't matter how you hide *
971731 975068 * We find you if we're wanting to *

977446 981282 * So slide back down
and close your eyes *

981324 985536 * Sleep a while
you must be tired *

1022069 1026073 24k, huh? It's 18k.
It's crap. It's probably fake.
1028575 1033079 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

1037792 1040419 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.

1040503 1043338 Now, you,
take it or leave it.

1052180 1055350 - You cheap ass, chrome dome...
- ( Siren Wailing )

1058477 1060855 Close the gate
when you go out!

1060938 1063607 Oh, I close this up
for you real good, massa.

1066276 1069696 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1074409 1078872 Lucky I didn't stab
your fat ass.
1099765 1104561 * That point me to another day *

1183925 1187052 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?

1239391 1242019 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1242103 1246189 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1246273 1249693 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1249735 1252320 - You're out of your fucking mind--
- Listen!

1252403 1257242 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1257325 1262287 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.

1267959 1273756 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1282972 1287894 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1287978 1292607 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1297318 1299862 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1336188 1342068 * Sometimes it rains inside my head *

1349950 1354287 - Look at this mess!
What's the world coming to?
- It's a mess.
1359460 1361586 * No, they don't have to take you *

1361669 1364422 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1364506 1369092 * No, they don't have
to take you away *

1369175 1372470 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1373597 1375514 Give me some of that
over there!

1377767 1381479 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1381521 1386316 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1386358 1390196 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1390279 1394491 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1394532 1398619 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1441575 1446245 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.

1484030 1490161 * No, they don't have
to take you away **

1496792 1499961 ( Man ) Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!

1518561 1524108 - ( Clearing Throat )
- I told you to stay out of here.

1524149 1527820 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1527903 1531948 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

1537830 1540832 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1546544 1550215 - "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."
- ( Laughing )
1565229 1567690 Who the fuck is this now?

1574738 1578574 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1586164 1590418 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1598092 1602471 "Suddenly I heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1602512 1606475 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door."

1613607 1617734 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fucking new door!

1620153 1623115 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1654893 1660190 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1661816 1665277 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1667989 1671658 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

1679040 1682002 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1682085 1685130 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1685213 1688007 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1688090 1692261 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1692344 1697056 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1697140 1699058 I'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1699142 1702895 Word to the wise:
Watch your fucking mouth.

1704104 1706524 What the hell
do you call that?

1710235 1714031 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1714072 1716867 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1726583 1729210 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1729252 1732172 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1732255 1736634 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1736717 1742222 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1745809 1748396 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1765285 1769497 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1793395 1796314 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1799566 1802402 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1802486 1805113 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1805196 1807574 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1807657 1812745 T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1819751 1822504 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1822587 1825257 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1826924 1830303 Each one of these is a life...

1839436 1843606 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1852239 1856452 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1858328 1862416 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1862499 1866127 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!

1890565 1894027 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.

1901242 1905704 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1920592 1924513 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1924597 1929768 And I say I'm dead and I move.

1933188 1937567 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1937650 1940778 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1942655 1945824 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1945907 1949911 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?

1952705 1957335 I want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1957377 1962214 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1962297 1966761 - It's getting too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1966844 1969262 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1969346 1973934 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1974017 1976601 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1976685 1980188 - ( Looter ) Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1980272 1985610 - ( Glass Shattering )
- He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1985693 1989364 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

1995119 1998538 - ( Woman Laughing )
- ( Looter ) Leave it, run!

2008339 2010925 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

2011009 2013302 and you lose him
right out in the open.

2013385 2019224 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.

2027607 2030818 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

2030901 2035156 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

2071355 2075317 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

2075401 2078611 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

2078695 2080447 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

2083283 2086618 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

2086660 2088954 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

2089037 2093624 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

2093666 2096252 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

2096336 2099505 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2102174 2104760 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2104844 2107637 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.

2110557 2114603 I still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2114687 2119149 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2119232 2121066 Call it my need to know.

2162437 2165732 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

2169610 2173906 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2173990 2177035 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2181163 2185917 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2187085 2190589 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2207520 2212107 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2212191 2216528 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

2220115 2224327 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--"

2226538 2229415 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2229498 2233585 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2233668 2239549 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2239632 2243177 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2243261 2247265 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2254271 2258024 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2260277 2265030 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.

2301313 2304983 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

2329881 2332509 - There's a big fucking bird over there.
- * No more **

2370793 2375338 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!

2382220 2385265 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2393189 2398026 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2400028 2404949 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2429555 2432266 Stop me if you heard this one.

2440691 2443442 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2447154 2449406 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2454911 2459498 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

2461709 2465796 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2490026 2492028 I've got a gun
in my pocket.

2495073 2497783 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2531147 2535651 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2535734 2540489 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2550915 2555711 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2585488 2589158 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2592577 2595956 Fill it up yourself, macho man.

2611303 2613889 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2613972 2616433 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2616516 2619436 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2619520 2622312 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.

2631237 2634950 - You stay put right there.
- ( Groaning )

2677613 2683369 ( Man On Radio ) As you can see, I'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2683411 2686163 - ( Door Squeaking )
- the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2686246 2689208 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2689291 2692252 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2692293 2694461 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2694545 2696672 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2696755 2701509 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--
2704596 2708099 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

2714355 2718067 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2718150 2720403 You still have your hat on.
2736250 2740545 are you some kind of... ghost?

2750179 2754725 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2756727 2760815 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2760898 2763984 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2764067 2768654 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

2771448 2775786 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2775869 2779080 Her body finally just gave it up.

2779122 2783001 I saw it.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2810900 2812986 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2813069 2818533 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2818616 2823371 I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2823413 2826373 Give me something
I could work with.

2831212 2833713 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2833797 2837133 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2837216 2840677 would talk after
what happened to you?

2844056 2846725 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.

2852772 2857234 Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2862115 2866118 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2866201 2869705 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2882424 2886886 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2891558 2894768 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2898397 2901108 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2904152 2909990 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2921084 2924588 ( Gideon ) I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2924671 2927798 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2927882 2930927 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2931010 2934263 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2934304 2936849 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2936932 2941353 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2946524 2948984 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2949067 2951570 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2951653 2957158 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.

2960078 2965166 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!

2972464 2974883 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2974967 2976969 What're you telling me,
this thing is real?

2977010 2980679 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2980762 2984725 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2984808 2988937 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2991731 2996903 Eyes see. It's one of the most important
things I learned from my sister.

2996986 3000240 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? ( Laughing )

3003742 3006912 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

3006996 3009248 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

3009332 3012834 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

3012959 3016420 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

3016504 3019881 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.

3022259 3026055 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

3029265 3033937 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

3034019 3038399 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
3038441 3041152 I ain't making all this up.

3041235 3045739 I ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

3054330 3059334 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

3069594 3072597 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

3081897 3084191 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

3086944 3091822 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

3091905 3095826 I'll have the janitor
come on up.
3167515 3169434 * It can't rain all the time *

3169518 3174022 ( Skipping )
* Can't rain all the time *

3183113 3185825 ( T-bird ) I don't know how many times I
gotta tell you. We're in this together!
3185908 3188828 One part falls, it all falls!

3188911 3192372 - You know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

3192414 3195000 That piece of ratshit made Tin Tin
into a fucking voodoo doll!

3200295 3204508 Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

3256389 3259975 What the fuck are
you supposed to be, man?

3288251 3291503 - Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

3302556 3306975 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? I got it.

3308602 3311480 We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

3311563 3314649 - This is business, right?
- ( Gun Cocks ) Faster.

3321865 3324283 I hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

3325868 3328871 - What in the crap--
- ( Tires Screech, Siren Wails )

3335252 3337962 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

3343551 3346511 This is Vehicle 48. We got us
a big, old, red hot rod.

3352559 3355311 You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.

3374954 3377164 Oh, my God!
Get outta the way!

3388258 3392511 - ( Engine Rattling )
- Holy shit! Goddamn foreign cars!

3405816 3409528 Oh, I hate this.
This ain't good.

3432631 3435885 But I don't know what--
What? Huh? What?

3435927 3438721 What are you talking about?
No, no, no, no, no.

3438763 3441890 You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, I remember her.

3441932 3444101 We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

3444184 3447436 She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

3447519 3451106 And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

3451190 3454609 into a total cluster fuck!
Who gives a shit?

3454693 3457946 It's ancient history!
Why? What do you want?

3458029 3462950 What is it? What?
Speak to me. Speak!

3473961 3479174 I know you. I know you.
I knew I knew you.

3479216 3483302 I knew I knew you.
But you ain't you.

3483469 3487389 You can't be you. We put you through
the window. There ain't no coming back.

3487472 3490934 This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

3490976 3493354 We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

3497983 3500944 There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!
3511161 3514123 and felt how awful goodness is."

3584103 3586397 ( Woman ) This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

3586480 3588815 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

3588857 3593236 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, "Devil's Night"...

3593319 3596738 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

3596822 3602203 Last year over 200 blazes were reported,
and 11 people lost their lives.

3602244 3607415 Tonight may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

3607499 3611127 The mayor has fire fighters
from all surrounding counties--

3611210 3615006 Do you like them up or over?
I can't remember.

3617050 3619760 What are you doing?
I don't even like eggs.

3619843 3624765 - Wait, you loved eggs.
- Yeah, when I was five.

3624849 3628976 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

3629059 3632396 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

3632438 3637567 Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

3643448 3648703 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

3651205 3655501 Oh, forget it. I never was
too good at this mommy shit.

3680190 3683109 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

3683192 3686446 We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

3686529 3690741 - We're gonna have to l.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-bird.

3692827 3694787 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

3706922 3710467 I got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right...

3713887 3716306 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

3716389 3720267 - You're the detective. You tell me.
- Okay.

3720351 3722478 Gideon's blows all to hell and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

3722562 3725440 who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

3725481 3728442 Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

3728525 3730444 and you're saying this is
just a fucking automobile accident?

3730527 3732821 - Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

3732905 3734905 I didn't want to interrupt you.
It sounded good.
3734988 3736991 You gotta write that shit down.

3739034 3742121 The captain's got a little
love note waiting for you.

3742163 3746124 - Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
- Suspension?

3750003 3754007 ( Dials Phone )
Yeah, give me the lab.

3804762 3807346 ( Shelly ) One for sorrow,
two for joy...

3807429 3810266 - Come here.
- ...three for a girl, four for a boy.

3908397 3912151 You said,
"Can't rain all the time."
3912234 3915486 That is from your song, right?

3925412 3928540 - ( Cawing )
